title: Clean up site
body:
1. Divide all multipliers by 3. This keeps their ratios the same, and moves the lowest paying pools to 1x. 
2. Move all inactive pools to an "inactive pools" page. 
3. Create two additional columns for the farm page layout so that all the farms can be more easily viewed. 
4. Add a bunch of new farming pairs. The more the merrier. If funding the addition of farming pairs is a problem, put up a community gas tank address on home page that people can donate too. 
5. integrate a twitter feed into the jiaozi homepage. 
6. Do *something* with the red background. It's boring.
7. Implement a FAQ page for newbies. 
8. Improve the jiaozi logo.
author: 0x7Fb7e28B8bbbA6A0C28c8Ac6a522C2FEFe44ee96
